home.title: Almousli Restaurant - Authentic Damascus Syrian Cuisine in Sweden
home.description: Experience authentic Damascus flavors in Eskilstuna. Syrian shawarma, kibbeh, fatteh, and traditional Damascene dishes. Order via Wolt & Foodora.

menu.title: Our Menu - Authentic Damascus Dishes

about.description: Learn our story and how we bring the rich heritage of Damascus cuisine to Sweden with authenticity and love

hero.title: From the Heart of Damascus to Sweden

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: From the ancient streets of Damascus to the heart of Sweden

story.title: Family Heritage and Damascus Authenticity
story.text:
Almousli Restaurant is more than just a restaurant - it's a piece of Damascus in Sweden. Our journey began with a simple dream: to share the flavors of our childhood and our family heritage with everyone here in Eskilstuna.

Every recipe we serve carries memories of Damascus's ancient alleys, family laughter around the dinner table, and the secret spices passed down through generations. We cook the way our grandmothers taught us - with patience, with love, and with deep respect for the ingredients.

From our secret shawarma blend to the way we roll grape leaves, every detail in our restaurant reflects Damascus authenticity and warm Levantine hospitality.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.text: We use traditional recipes and original spices to ensure the true taste of Damascus

quality.title: Quality
quality.text: Fresh ingredients daily, certified halal meats, and healthy vegetable oils

hospitality.title: Hospitality
hospitality.text: Levantine hospitality - we welcome you as if you were guests in our homes

community.title: Community
community.text: We're proud to serve Eskilstuna's diverse community and build cultural bridges through food

chef.title: Our Chef
chef.text: Our kitchen is led by a Syrian chef with 20 years of experience, who learned the art of Damascus cooking in the finest restaurants of the Levant.
